title: BlindBit Desktop User Guide
description: Step-by-step guide to setting up and using BlindBit Desktop wallet

steps.name: Import Existing Wallet
steps.description: Select "Import Existing Wallet" to restore wallet from seed phrase

steps.name: Make Network Selection
steps.description:
Choose "mainnet" for production use
Select "Continue" to confirm network

steps.name: Finalize Wallet Setup
steps.description:
Choose a "block height" to capture any previous silent payment transactions for this wallet
Select "Save & Continue" to complete setup and start scanning for transactions
steps.notes:
wallet.dat is stored in ~/.blindbit-desktop by default

**Warning:** key material in this file is not encrypted at this time

steps.name: Scanning
steps.notes:
"Current Scan Height": \# will match "Chain Tip" when sync is complete

**Rescan Button**: only use this button after changing "birth height" in settings or testing

steps.name: UTXOs
steps.description: View wallet balance and unspent transaction outputs
steps.notes: Toggle the "Show only unspent UTXOs" to view spent too

steps.name: Send
steps.notes: Fee Rate must be greater than or equal to 1 sat/vB

steps.name: Transactions
steps.notes:
received transactions will only appear once the transaction is confirmed in a block

spending transactions will appear immediately

fees will only appear if spent from this wallet - not available after recovery

steps.name: Settings
steps.notes: restart may be required after applying new settings

steps.name: Enter Recipient Information
steps.description:
Enter a recipient address, the amount to send, fee rate
Select "Send Transaction" to view details
steps.notes:
Currently blindbit-desktop does not support coin selection or Human Readable Names (HRN) addresses at this time

Fee rate will be increased to spend remaining UTXO to avoid dust

steps.name: Preview Transaction
steps.description: Select "Confirm & Broadcast" to send the transaction
steps.notes: Select "Close" to return to the previous view and make changes

steps.name: Pending Transactions
steps.description: Unconfirmed transactions will have a "Pending" status

steps.name: Spent UTXOs
steps.description: While a transaction is being confirmed the whole UTXO is treated as spent

steps.name: UTXOs
steps.description: UTXOs will appear here automatically after confirmation

steps.name: Transactions
steps.description:
History of wallet transactions
Select a "transaction" to view details
steps.notes: received transactions will appear here automatically when confirmed

build_instructions:
Instructions for compiling BlindBit Desktop from [source](https://github.com/setavenger/blindbit-desktop?tab=readme-ov-file#prerequisites)
Quick Start
1. Verify Go version 1.24 or later
```
go version
```
2. Compile blindbit-desktop
```
cd blindbit-desktop
git checkout -B alpha origin/alpha
go build -o blindbit-desktop ./cmd/blindbit-desktop
./blindbit-desktop
```
troubleshooting:
### Screenshots Don't Match
- Verify the wallet was compiled from the correct branch "alpha"

### Sync Issues
- Verify your internet connection
- Check firewall settings
- Allow sufficient time for blockchain synchronization
